channel.title: Model i made just want some opinions
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YrrW50R.png[/img]
or
[img]http://i.imgur.com/D0KBCVX.png[/img]
i may make it into a halberd i will probably touch it up some more later, but i made it this morning i liked the simpleness of it. i know the color on the right side of the handle is a lil wrong im gunna fix it up later.
EDIT: heres it as a halber
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tc9rfoq.png[/img]
or
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qxoti79.png[/img]

item.title: Model i made just want some opinions
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

thanks for the good comments guys

Uncalled:

There’s some lighting that could be worked on, but nonetheless, that’s a pretty well done model. It’s unique, I like it. Some flaws here and there, but those could be patched fairly easily.

yea i agree, if i end up putting it in game i will first send it over to amy_webb to touch it up cause she always makes my models 1000x better

Read full topic
item.source: Model i made just want some opinions

item.title: Model i made just want some opinions
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

amy_webb:

The second one looks better, where it faces backwards. It looks nice, but you could do a bit more with the colour. Maybe add some detail to bring it to life more, if you know what i mean. If you had an idea of what kinda halberd you wanted it to be, aim more for that direction. For instance, if i was a dragon halberd, you’d add spikes. Also, the heal out scales the rest, when a halberd is perfectly scaled between the top and the pole.

Read full topic
item.source: Model i made just want some opinions

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

There’s some lighting that could be worked on, but nonetheless, that’s a pretty well done model. It’s unique, I like it. Some flaws here and there, but those could be patched fairly easily.

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

The second one looks better, where it faces backwards. It looks nice, but you could do a bit more with the colour. Maybe add some detail to bring it to life more, if you know what i mean. If you had an idea of what kinda halberd you wanted it to be, aim more for that direction. For instance, if i was a dragon halberd, you’d add spikes. Also, the heal out scales the rest, when a halberd is perfectly scaled between the top and the pole.
